title: Christmas At The Riviera (2007) Alexander Armstrong Darren Boyd
description:
A heart-warming British comedy with an all-star cast including;

Alexander Armstrong (The first half of comedy duo Armstrong & Miller)

Darren Boyd (The guy who deserves an Oscar for being Cleese in Holy Flying Circus)

Anna Chancellor (Duckface from Four Weddings & A Funeral)

Warren Clarke (The guy who appears in half the British TV shows made since 1966)

Pam Ferris (Aunt Marge from Harry Potter & The Prisoner Of Azkaban)

Barbara Flynn (Fitz's cracking wife from Cracker)

Sam Kelly (Manny's Moo-Pa from Black Books)

Tim Key (The guy who REALLY can't believe Warwick Davis wasn't in Time Bandits)

Alex Macqueen (Neil's Bumder from The Inbetweeners)

Katherine Parkinson (The woman who can't believe you need a description)

Reece Shearsmith (Hello Dave!)

Peter Vaughn (The old guy who sh*ts on the young guy's arm in Death At A Funeral)

Geoffrey Whitehead (The guy who's son-in-law accidentally cemented his dog)
